text: Bringing Down the House is a 2003 romantic comedy movie. The movie is about a working tax attorney who tries to turn his life around. Steve Martin plays Peter. Queen Latifah plays Charlene. Joan Plowright plays Virginia. The movie received mixed to negative reviews from critics. It made quite a bit of money anyway. ==Other websites== * Category:2003 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies
title: Bringing Down the House
